org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.domain.transactionprocessor

Class AbstractLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.domain.transactionprocessor.AbstractLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreocoreLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor, EarlyPaymentLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor, FineractStyleLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor, HeavensFamilyLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor, InterestPrincipalPenaltyFeesOrderLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor, PrincipalInterestPenaltyFeesOrderLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor, RBILoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor

    public abstract class AbstractLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor
    Abstract implementation of LoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor which is more convenient for concrete implementations to extend.
    See Also:
    InterestPrincipalPenaltyFeesOrderLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor, HeavensFamilyLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor, CreocoreLoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor

    • Method Detail

      • handleTransaction

        public ChangedTransactionDetail handleTransaction(org.joda.time.LocalDate disbursementDate,
                                                  java.util.List<LoanTransaction> transactionsPostDisbursement,
                                                  MonetaryCurrency currency,
                                                  java.util.List<LoanRepaymentScheduleInstallment> installments,
                                                  java.util.Set<LoanCharge> charges)
        Provides support for passing all LoanTransaction's so it will completely re-process the entire loan schedule. This is required in cases where the LoanTransaction being processed is in the past and falls before existing transactions or and adjustment is made to an existing in which case the entire loan schedule needs to be re-processed.
        Specified by:
        handleTransaction in interface LoanRepaymentScheduleTransactionProcessor
